original_title: Last Fast Ride: The Life, Love and Death of a Punk Goddess
overview: Henry Rollins narrates Lilly Scourtis Ayers' no-holds-barred profile of volatile Bay Area punk legend Marian Anderson, whose hypnotic beauty, devil-may-care rebellion and shocking sexual exploits onstage launched her to infamy before tragically dying of a heroin overdose at the tender age of 33.
title: Last Fast Ride: The Life, Love and Death of a Punk Goddess
